chatgpt_solution: We could work from left to right and simplify numerator and denominator separately.  We can also work from right to left.  Since $10^{-2}=10^{-2}\cdot 1=10^{-2}\cdot 5^0$, we get \[\frac{10^{-2}\cdot 5^0}{10^{-3}} = \frac{10^{-2}\cdot 5^0}{10^{-2}\cdot 10^1}=\frac{10^{-2}}{10^{-2}}\cdot \frac{5^0}{10^1}=\frac{1}{1}\cdot \frac{1}{10}=\boxed{\frac{1}{10}}.\]
